turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Effects of the Gaza War (2008–09).
turn.1: What was the humanitarian impact of the Gaza War?
turn.2: The UN described the situation as a "critical protection crisis".
turn.3: Why was it described as a critical protection crisis?
turn.4: The entire civilian population in the Gaza strip remains vulnerable, the UN reported, with no safe haven, no bomb shelters and with closed borders, making it one of the rare conflicts where civilians have no place to flee.
turn.6: There is a sense of "panic, fear and distress" throughout the whole strip.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Civilians have implemented a self-imposed curfew since no public warning systems or effective shelters exist.
turn.9: What did people do when they were trying to escape?
turn.10: People have been evacuating their homes and staying in streets for long hours exposed to further danger, or staying with relatives.
turn.12: Civilians face insecurities while re-stocking basic food items, water and cooking gas.
